src.thread

Class ResolveThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • src.thread.ResolveThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ThreadFVA, ThreadKO, ThreadReac, ThreadTwoReacs

    public abstract class ResolveThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Superclass of all FlexFlux threads. To avoid problems, all threads copy the a bind object.
    Author:
    lmarmiesse 8 mars 2013
